articles.title: Dozens of ASML shipments to China face tougher export curbs - Financial Times
articles.description: The Netherlands seeks to align with US and Japan as introduction of licence tightens controls from September
articles.content:
Dozens of ASML chipmaking machines destined for China will soon need a licence to be shipped after the Dutch government followed the US and Japan in imposing tough curbs on technology exports.
